name: 陳秀慧
objective:
介紹各類紡織纖維之染色理論與基本染色方法；包括染料應用上之分類與紡織物纖維的類別，一般染色之理論，染色機械之類別，纖維素纖維、蛋白質纖維、聚酯纖維、聚醯胺纖維、聚丙烯睛纖維及其混紡織物的染色原理及應用以及各種纖維染色缺點以及防止與修正缺點之方法。
Introducing the dyeing theory and dyeing method of various textile fibers; which include the classification of dyestuffs and textile fibers, the dyeing machine, the dyeing theory and dyeing methods of cellulosic fibers, protein fibers, synthetic fibers and their blends, also the cause and correction of dyeing defects.
